name: poker-planning-2
description: Service to be able to play in agile game called porker planing

scripts.prod: npm run prod --prefix shared && npm run prod --prefix frontend && npm run prod --prefix backend && npm run copy-statics
scripts.after-install: npm i --prefix frontend && npm i --prefix backend
scripts.after-ci: npm ci --prefix frontend && npm ci --prefix backend
scripts.lint:staged: npm run lint:staged --prefix frontend && npm run lint:staged --prefix backend
scripts.lint:prettier:fix: npm run lint:prettier:fix --prefix frontend && npm run lint:prettier:fix --prefix backend

simple-git-hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint:staged && npm run patch-version
